author: danj
msg: 1. Modified documentation link so that it goes to the current release's documentation section.
2. Removed the JavaScript highlight box thing from selected menu items and replaced it with a simple bold-ing of the
selected item. This not only prevents the slight shifting of the words but also an IE-only bug in the display. We
still have highlighting, but it's not as loud and doesn't require javascript/css.

author: ningjiang
msg: [CXF-39] Implement Destination & Conduit API for JMS transport

author: danj
msg: Last refactoring of /docs, I swear. I realized that my plan for supporting multiple version of the documentation (for past
releases and the current release) was flawed and modified the directory structure so that we can do this properly. The
docs/index.html file now forwards to the latest version (docs/x.y.z/index.html), and each release can contain only the
directory that contains their version of the docs. I may change docs/index.html to have a list of the previous versions.
Also, I filled in 2/3 of the content for step 5 of the tutorial. step 2 is a little more accurate as well.
